PolicyActuals:
select to_char(to_date(as_of_date,'YYYYMMDD')) as as_of_date,policy_id,to_char(cf_source_type) as cf_source_type,
to_char(scenario_no) as scenario_no,to_char(cash_flow_date) as cash_flow_date,
to_char(ccy_cd) as ccy_cd,to_char(coverage_type) as coverage_type,
to_char(investment_identifier) as investment_identifier,to_char(risk_expiry_status) as risk_expiry_status
 from fsi_ins_policy_cash_flows where cf_source_type =1 order by cash_flow_date
CohortActuals:
select to_char(to_date(as_of_date,'YYYYMMDD')) as as_of_date,to_char(group_id) as group_id,to_char(cf_source_type) as cf_source_type,
to_char(scenario_no) as scenario_no,to_char(cash_flow_date) as cash_flow_date,to_char(ccy_cd) as ccy_cd,
to_char(coverage_type) as coverage_type,to_char(investment_identifier) as investment_identifier,
to_char(risk_expiry_status) as risk_expiry_status from fsi_ins_group_cash_flows where cf_source_type =1
PolicyAssumed:
select to_char(to_date(as_of_date,'YYYYMMDD')) as as_of_date,policy_id,to_char(cf_source_type) as cf_source_type,
to_char(scenario_no) as scenario_no,to_char(cash_flow_date) as cash_flow_date,
to_char(ccy_cd) as ccy_cd,to_char(coverage_type) as coverage_type,
to_char(investment_identifier) as investment_identifier,to_char(risk_expiry_status) as risk_expiry_status
 from fsi_ins_policy_cash_flows where cf_source_type =2
CohortAssumed:
select to_char(to_date(as_of_date,'YYYYMMDD')) as as_of_date,to_char(group_id) as group_id,to_char(cf_source_type) as cf_source_type,
to_char(scenario_no) as scenario_no,to_char(cash_flow_date) as cash_flow_date,to_char(ccy_cd) as ccy_cd,
to_char(coverage_type) as coverage_type,to_char(investment_identifier) as investment_identifier,
to_char(risk_expiry_status) as risk_expiry_status from fsi_ins_group_cash_flows where cf_source_type =2
